alert.note: Alert for Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 9:53AM CST until February 26 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River at Monticello. * WHEN...From Friday morning to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage around sunrise tomorrow morning, and crest of 14.4 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Sangamon River Monticello 13.0 8.4 Thu 9 am CST 13.6 14.3 13.2 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
